steps.name: CypherCommand
commands:
with 4 as hexLength
match [token:occupationMatch](n:esco__Skill)[token:whereClause]
with distinct n, hexLength
with n, hexLength, '0x' + right( n.uri, hexLength) as baseHexCode
with n, hexLength, baseHexCode, toLower(apoc.text.hexValue( apoc.convert.toInteger(baseHexCode) + 1)) as replacementChars, left(right( n.uri, 36),36 - hexLength) as trimmedUri
with n, replacementChars, trimmedUri + right (replacementChars,hexLength ) as newUri
create (l:SkillLabel:Resource {skos__prefLabel: n.skos__prefLabel, uri: "<<contentapiprefix>>/SkillLabel/" + newUri})
create (n)-[:hasPrefLabel]->(l)

with 8 as hexLength
match [token:occupationMatch](n:esco__Skill)[token:whereClause] 
with distinct n, hexLength
unwind n.skos__altLabel as altLabels
with n, altLabels, hexLength, '0x' + right( n.uri, hexLength) as baseHexCode
with n, altLabels, hexLength, baseHexCode, toLower(apoc.text.hexValue( apoc.convert.toInteger(baseHexCode) + apoc.coll.indexOf(n.skos__altLabel,altLabels) + 2)) as replacementChars, left(right( n.uri, 36),36 - hexLength) as trimmedUri
with n, altLabels, replacementChars, trimmedUri + right (replacementChars,hexLength ) as newUri
create (l:SkillLabel:Resource {skos__prefLabel: altLabels, uri: "<<contentapiprefix>>/SkillLabel/" + newUri})
create (n)-[:hasAltLabel]->(l)

with 4 as hexLength, 500 as offset
match [token:occupationMatch](n:esco__Skill)[token:whereClause]
with distinct n, hexLength, offset
unwind n.skos__hiddenLabel as altLabels
with n, altLabels, hexLength, offset, '0x' + right( n.uri, hexLength) as baseHexCode
with n, altLabels, hexLength, baseHexCode, toLower(apoc.text.hexValue( apoc.convert.toInteger(baseHexCode) + apoc.coll.indexOf(n.skos__hiddenLabel,altLabels) + offset)) as replacementChars, left(right( n.uri, 36),36 - hexLength) as trimmedUri
with n, altLabels, replacementChars, trimmedUri + right (replacementChars,hexLength ) as newUri
create (l:SkillLabel:Resource {skos__prefLabel: altLabels, uri: "<<contentapiprefix>>/SkillLabel/" + newUri})
create (n)-[:hasHiddenLabel]->(l)
